XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <Route Url="/UpdateSchool/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.School:Update"/> <!-- RoomBroker --> <Route Url="/CreateRoom/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.Room:CreateRoom"/> <Route Url="/GetAllRoomsForSchool/" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.Room:GetAllRoomsForSchool"/> <Route Url="/DeleteRoom/:IdRoom" Method="DELETE" Call="SPD.Logic.Room:DeleteRoom"/> <Route Url="/UpdateRoom/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.Room:UpdateRoom"/>
<!--Instructor--> <Route Url="/CreateInstructor/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.Instructor:CreateInstructor"/> <!--Instructor-->
<!--School--> <Route Url="/CreateJurnall/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.School:CreateJurnall"/> <Route Url="/CreateTimeTable/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.School:CreateTimeTable"/> <Route Url="/GetLessonTypes/" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.School:GetLessonTypes"/> <Route Url="/AddPrice/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.School:AddPrice"/> <Route Url="/GetPrice/:ID" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.School:GetPrice"/> <Route Url="/InviteInstructor/:Email" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.School:InviteInstructor"/> <Route Url="/RemoveFromSchool/:ID" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.School:RemoveFromSchool"/>
<Route Url="/AddLessonInTable/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.TimeTableLessons:Create"/> <Route Url="/UpdateLessonInTable/:ID" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.TimeTableLessons:Update"/> <Route Url="/RemoveLessonFromTable/:ID" Method="DELETE" Call="SPD.Logic.TimeTableLessons:Delete"/> <Route Url="/UpdateLessonTable/" Method="POST" Call="SPD.Logic.TimeTableLessons:UpdateLessonTable"/> <Route Url="/GetLessonsFromTable/" Method="GET" Call="SPD.Logic.TimeTableLessons:GetLessonsFromTable"/>
<!--School-->
<!---->
<!---->
</Routes>

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: /// todo реализовать dispatch request так чтобы только школы могли получать данные (причём только к своим)
